description:
Kali Linux 2024.2 is now available for download. It features GNOME 46, enhanced Xfce, 18 new security tools, and 64-bit time_t transition.

The post Kali Linux 2024.2 Rolls Out With GNOME 46 and 18 New Tools appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Kali Linux 2024.2 Rolls Out With GNOME 46 and 18 New Tools

description:
Parrot OS 6.1, a Debian-based Linux distro focused on security and privacy, rolls out with enhanced security and performance features.

The post Parrot OS 6.1 Brings Raspberry Pi 5 Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Parrot OS 6.1 Brings Raspberry Pi 5 Support

description:
Debian 13 introduces tmpfs for /tmp and timed cleanup for /var/tmp, aligning with standard practices in the upcoming Trixie release.

The post Debian 13 Moves to tmpfs for /tmp/ Directory appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Debian 13 Moves to tmpfs for /tmp/ Directory

description:
The blendOS 4 release makes the Arch Linux-based distro fully declarative. This means that users can now install any packages, kernels, or drivers from both Arch Linux’s repositories and AUR (Arch User Repository) while using pre-configured desktop environments.

The post Immutable Distro blendOS 4 Officially Released, Now Fully Declarative appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Immutable Distro blendOS 4 Officially Released, Now Fully Declarative

description:
LibreOffice 24.2.4 is here a little over a month after the LibreOffice 24.2.3 update to fix more of those pesky bugs, crashes, and other annoyances reported by users in the latest LibreOffice 24.2 series, improving the overall stability and reliability of the office suite.

The post LibreOffice 24.2.4 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download With 72 Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: LibreOffice 24.2.4 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download With 72 Bug Fixes
